Package controller.interfaces

Interface IDoctorManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DoctorManager
public interface IDoctorManager
This interface provides methods to manage doctors in the system.
Since:
2024-11-16

    • setDoctorAvailability

      void setDoctorAvailability(model.users.Doctor doctor, DayOfWeek day, model.availability.TimePeriod availablePeriod)
      Sets the availability of a doctor for a specific day of the week.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose availability is being set.
      day - the day of the week.
      availablePeriod - the time period during which the doctor is available.

      date - the date.
      availablePeriod - the time period during which the doctor is available.
